Liberation Spirit

O Liberation Spirit, un-bind, un-fear, un-scorch, un-sear our souls; renew us in your free Spirit. We're leaning on you, our Tower of Strength. We find our refuge in the shade of your shelter. Lead us from this place - strong - to bring forth the power of your love, wherever we are.

Author: Rev. Dr. David Benke

Sources: Invocation given on September 23 at "A Prayer for America - a Memorial Service at Yankee Stadium."

Notes: This is my first line begain "We implore You in tender mercy to comfort with signs of Your Presence those who mourn the lost and missing and cannot find you now in the ashes; "
